properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 2:41PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Falling Creek near East Juliette  affecting Jones County

Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge...Telfair and Wilcox
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Lumber City affecting Montgomery...Telfair and
Wheeler Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Towaliga River near Juliette.
* Until further notice.
* At 2 PM Wednesday the stage was 18.4 feet...and cresting.
* Minor flooding will continue.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* At 18 feet...Minor flooding expands into woodlands and fields
upstream and downstream from the gage on Monticello Highway or
Georgia Highway 83.  Portions of Byars Road and numerous private
access roads near the river will flood.
